meanings.definition: To sleep lightly or take a short nap.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, I enjoy snoozing on the couch.
meanings.sent2: She was snoozing peacefully in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The cat was snoozing so soundly that even a loud noise didn't wake her up.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden seemed to be snoozing under the warm afternoon sun.
meanings.sent5: I find snoozing under a cozy blanket to be the best way to relax.

meanings.definition: The act of dozing or sleeping lightly.
meanings.sent1: I could hear the gentle snoozing of my dog beside me.
meanings.sent2: The snoozing of the baby in the crib was a comforting sound.
meanings.sent3: The rhythmic snoozing of the grandfather's chair filled the room with a peaceful ambiance.
meanings.sent4: The snoozing of the old clock on the wall was the only sound in the silent room.
meanings.sent5: The snoozing of the waves on the shore lulled me into a peaceful slumber.
